content: प्रली {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To become dissolved, melt away. {@--2@} To be absorbed or dissolved in, be resolved into; आत्मना कृतिना च त्वमात्मन्येव प्रलीयसे <ls>Ku. 2. 10</ls>; रात्र्यागमे प्रलीयंते तत्रैवाव्यक्तसंज्ञके <ls>Bg. 8. 18</ls>; <ls>Ms. 1. 54.</ls> {@--3@} To vanish, disappear; सह मेघेन तडित्प्रलीयते <ls>Ku. 4. 33.</ls> {@--4@} To be destroyed, to perish, die; <ls>Māl. 9. 21.</ls>
